scripts.deploy: cd storefront && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && shopify app deploy -c shopify.app.production.toml
scripts.deploy:dev: cd storefront && npm i && npm run build:dev && cd .. && shopify app deploy --config shopify.app.dev.toml
scripts.deploy:local: cd storefront && npm i && npm run build:local && cd .. && shopify app deploy --config shopify.app.toml
